    },

    id="2",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "text": "quick fox"

)

    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "script_score": {
            "query": {
                "match": {
                    "text": "quick brown fox"
                }
            },
            "script": {
                "source": "_termStats.termFreq().getAverage()"

    },
)
